---
id: Cancel订单
title: Cancel 订单
sidebar_label: Cancel 订单
sidebar_position: 3
description: /spot/v4/order/{orderId}
---

**类型:** DELETE

**描述:** `/spot/v4/order/{orderId}`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### 参数

| 名称      | 类型   | 必需 | 默认值值 | 描述 |
| --------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| `orderId` | 数字 | Yes       |         | 订单 ID    |

### 响应示例

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "字符串",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "cancelId": "6216559590087220004"
  }
}
```
